tasks.task: Grow garlic, dry bulb onions, and leeks.
subtasks: Plant cloves at appropriate times and spacing.
Apply nitrogen fertilizer in split applications.
Remove scapes for both garlic and onions.
Harvest bulbs when 60% leaves turn brown.
Store garlic and onions at appropriate temperatures.
Handle hardneck versus softneck garlic for North Dakota.
Test garlic cultivar performance in North Dakota.
Use sets or seed for onions and handle accordingly.
Handle weed control for all crops.
Address potential insect and disease issues (e.g., onion maggot, neck rot).
Answer miscellaneous questions about allium growth and varieties.
